title: Spicy Bean Salad
ingredients: ['1 can chick peas', '1 can borlotti beans', '1 can flageolet beans', '1 can red kidney beans', '1 can sweetcorn', '1 red chilli, diced small', '1 tablespoon fresh mint, roughly chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt & pepper to taste']
